trans-unit.source: If set to 'on', Facebook service icon will be availabe for user in social media bar. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', Twitter service icon will be availabe for user in social media bar. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', Google+ service icon will be availabe for user in social media bar. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', Xing service icon will be availabe for user in social media bar. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', user can enable Facebook service icon permanently. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', user can enable Twitter service icon permanently. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', user can enable Google+ service icon permanently. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
If set to 'on', user can enable Xing service icon permanently. Setting overrides same value from extension setup.
Select your favoured Facebook action (Recommend or Like). Setting overrides same value from extension setup. The language of the button can be defined in Setup.
Text enterred here will be appended to the URL to allow referrer tracking.
Text enterred here will be appended to the URL to allow referrer tracking.
Text enterred here will be appended to the URL to allow referrer tracking.
Text enterred here will be appended to the URL to allow referrer tracking.
Text enterred here will be used as Tweet text. It will be truncated to 120 characters. Leave empty to use auto generation.

If left empty, auto generation will determine a propper Tweet text in the following order: If Meta tag "DC.title" is available, it will be used as Tweet text. If not, the page title will be used. If "DC.creator" is available, it will be appended to the text.
The URI which will be promoted by the send button. Leave empty for auto generation.
In most cases auto generation will be the best pick. Leave field empty in this case. Otherwise use a URI in Typolink Format. This URI will be used by the social buttons.
